name: Arcane Thief
description:
In this short demo, you are playing as a mage-thief, accessing this strange dimension rigged with dangerous traps and fabulous treasures. Use your teleporting skills to delve deep into darkness and seek the ultimate tresure.

Requires the Oculus Rift and Xbox One controller.

Feel free to use the following email address for suggestions or report an issue.

telamontgdvr@gmail.com
